meanings.definition: Excessively extravagant or wasteful in spending money.
meanings.sent1: She bought an overextravagant dress for the party.
meanings.sent2: Their overextravagant lifestyle led to financial troubles.
meanings.sent3: The overextravagant unicorn spent all its gold on sparkly shoes.
meanings.sent4: Her overextravagant dreams of luxury crumbled in reality.
meanings.sent5: The overextravagant chandelier in the ballroom dazzled all the guests.

meanings.definition: Going beyond what is reasonable or necessary in terms of extravagance.
meanings.sent1: The overextravagant decorations at the event were unnecessary.
meanings.sent2: He received criticism for his overextravagant proposal.
meanings.sent3: The overextravagant cat demanded a diamond-studded collar.
meanings.sent4: Her overextravagant laughter echoed through the quiet library.
meanings.sent5: The overextravagant fireworks display lit up the night sky.
